user_query: I am planning a family vacation to the United States. Can you provide me with the details of the country, including the number of regions? Additionally, fetch the outline boundaries of the postal sectors W41, W42, W43, W44, and W45 in the UK.

TaskList.description: Fetch the details of the United States, including information on the number of regions.
Fetch the outline boundaries of the postal sectors W41, W42, W43, W44, and W45 in the UK.
